download_blocked_message_title.description: The title of the message shown to the user when a download is blocked

download_blocked_message_body.message: Download of $filename$ from $url$ has been blocked. Download URL: $fileUrl$

download_notify_message_body.message: Download of $filename$ from $url$ has been detected. Download URL: $fileUrl$
download_notify_message_body.description: The body of the message shown to the user when a download is detected
